tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medical_records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  medical_history TEXT,
  prescribed_medications TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
dob DATE NOT NULL,
address VARCHAR(255),
contact_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id INT NOT NULL,
date DATE NOT NULL,
doctor VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
condition VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id));

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    medication TEXT,
    prescription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_healthcare (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    block_hash VARCHAR(64),
    previous_block_hash VARCHAR(64),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    dob DATE NOT NULL,
    gender TEXT,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE NOT NULL,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Patients ( patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, gender ENUM('M', 'F', 'Other') NOT NULL, blood_type VARCHAR(3) )

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords ( record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT NOT NULL, record_date DATE NOT NULL, diagnosis VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, prescription TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE TABLE Doctors ( doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, doctor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, specialization VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, experience_years INT NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE Appointments ( appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT NOT NULL, doctor_id INT NOT NULL, appointment_date DATETIME NOT NULL, status ENUM('Scheduled', 'Cancelled', 'Completed') NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE BlockchainData ( block_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT NOT NULL, record_id INT NOT NULL, block_hash VARCHAR(64) UNIQUE NOT NULL, previous_block_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, nonce INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES MedicalRecords(record_id) ON DELETE CASCADE )
